rows.label: tev015401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Isobe about Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Isobe if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Isobe about the device Lin is working on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Isobe about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Isobe about the Skell flight module.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Isobe about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0001
rows.name:
I know Lin looks demure, but she's stubborn as an ox.
Once she decides on a course of action, she won't let
anything get in her way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0002
rows.name:
Right now, she's apparently working on some
contraption that's supposed to let Skells fly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0003
rows.name:
The more levelheaded mechanics keep telling her to
give it up, but it doesn't look like she intends to take
their advice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0004
rows.name:
On the contrary, she's in talks with Commander
Vandham about increasing her development budget.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0005
rows.name:
I'd put the odds of failure at around 99 percent for
your normal, run-of-the-mill mechanic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0006
rows.name:
But given how stubborn Lin is, we may well see massive
Skells doing loop-the-loops over New LA one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0010
rows.name:
We need to develop equipment that is capable of
resisting the strange energy attacks used by Miran
indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0011
rows.name:
But with the technologies that are currently available
to Sakuraba Industries, that won't be an easy task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0012
rows.name:
No matter how thick we layer the armor, that energy
can blast right through it and harm the wearer.
It's like the laws of physics don't even apply![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0013
rows.name:
We're grateful that you choose Sakuraba products,
so it shames me to have to say this, but please be
careful around indigens that use those energy attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0014
rows.name:
You'd be shocked at how ineffective your current armor
is against them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0019
rows.name:
She's developing a device that will somehow give the
power of flight to Skells that were designed for
terrestrial combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0020
rows.name:
Her actual development work has made some good
progress, but the field tests are apparently not going
well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0021
rows.name:
Earlier, the test Skell lost control and nearly crashed
into the city! That, er, caused quite the fuss...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0022
rows.name:
It's not looking like the device is going to be easy to
complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0023
rows.name:
But Lin's passion for the project remains unabated,
and that has me convinced that she'll see it through
somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0028
rows.name: Ma-non technology is absolutely unbelievable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0029
rows.name:
You know the armor that we've been working on—
with no success, I might add—to resist the strange
energy attacks used by some Miran indigens?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0030
rows.name:
Well, the Ma-non banged it out like it was nothing!
I really want to ask Candid & Credible's head
technologist, Jajanni, how it works.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_0031
rows.name:
But as friendly as the Ma-non are, I bet even they
wouldn't share trade secrets with a competitor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1001
rows.name:
I was first shown the schematics for a prototype of
the Skell flight module years ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1002
rows.name:
And do you know who it was that approached me
about it? Lin's parents![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1003
rows.name:
They began development on it way back then,
fully aware that it would take a great deal of time
to complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1004
rows.name:
Who'd have believed that their daughter would be the
one to improve on their design and ultimately complete
the project after their deaths?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1005
rows.name:
How happy they must be, wherever they are now,
to see their daughter bring their vision to life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1010
rows.name:
Thanks to our joint development of the Skell flight
module with Jajanni's team, Sakuraba Industries and
Candid & Credible are closer than ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1011
rows.name:
We're now having much deeper discussions with them
than we'd ever thought possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1012
rows.name:
Jajanni has even been participating in technology-
exchange conferences, where he's been discussing
all sorts of things with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1013
rows.name:
It's just one new discovery after another for us now.
Hard to believe I'm still learning new things at my age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015401_1014
rows.name:
We have to start making even better weapons,
so as not to waste the goodwill with the Ma-non
that Lin has created for us.[ST:wait ]
